name: Super Pipe Bird
description:
Your wings may be tiny, but oh-you-can-fly! Tapping the screen is all you need, well, many taps, just keep tapping, birdie will flap, flap, flap! But beware to not flop, dohh!

Super Pipe Bird is fun, featuring a very original and crispy gameplay, the best of its kind!

How to play:
- Just tap the screen! (it's that easy)
